summary: An email from attorney Martin G. Weinberg to an unspecified recipient, requesting confidential copies of the sealed indictment and any search warrants for Jeffrey Epstein's property. The email asserts Epstein's legal representation and requests protection of attorney-client privileged materials during any search and seizure.

persons.name: Martin G. Weinberg
persons.context: Attorney representing Jeffrey Epstein, sending a confidential email to request copies of sealed legal documents and to assert protection of privileged communications.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'Mr. Epstein', the subject of a sealed indictment and potential search warrants. He is stated to be actively represented by Martin Weinberg and other attorneys.

connections.description: Weinberg states he and other attorneys are actively representing Epstein, and he is seeking to protect privileged communications from seizure.

events.title: Attorney's Request for Sealed Documents
events.description: Martin G. Weinberg sends a confidential email requesting copies of the sealed indictment against Jeffrey Epstein and any related search warrants.

keyFacts: A sealed indictment exists against Jeffrey Epstein as of July 2019.
Search warrants for Epstein's residence or property were either issued or anticipated.
Attorney Martin G. Weinberg asserts active legal representation of Epstein and seeks to protect attorney-client privileged materials from review during any search.
The communication is marked as confidential and privileged, intended only for the addressee.
